5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever eats anything from this plant, let him not come to the mosque.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَكَلَ الثُّومَ فَلاَ يَقْرَبَنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ
chapter.eng-name: “Whoever eats garlic, let him not come near the mosque”
